Topic.Title: What is a fair price to get in?

Message.Msg: why don't you compromise and split the difference. Buy it at 160 after the two for one split of 320 price. should happen within a 6 or 9 month period.

IBM is a disaster. It is imploding. Get out while you still have a high price. They have sold the companys future for the short term gains. I am ex IBM and trust me the place is a corrupt place and firing US employees for cheap H1Bs and offshoring resources. Customers are bailing. GET OUT !
